title: Remove update dates and modified by dates from --json output unless specifically requested with a --json-verbose argument
Fix Claude hooks
description: The current Claude Hooks implementation is broken. Refer to the current .claude/settings.json file and just use that, which has been confirmed to work.

title: Add hash to changes.jsonl
description: Add the same hash from issues_{hash}.jsonl to changes.jsonl as it currently doesn't automatically merge in. Use the same hash (from the issues) so issues and changes are linked.

title: Add dynamic create behaviour
description: When  leece create is run with no arguments, it should create a new temporary text file in ~/.fleece/create/{random_hash}.txt and open a new text editor at that location with an empty YAML template containing the various issue items. It should then watch for when this text editor is closed, read the YAML and if valid create a new issue with those properties.

title: Remove complete issues from list
description: When an issue is complete, it should not be shown in the  leece list command unless an --all flag is passed in.

title: Add tags property
description: Each issue should be able to be tagged with an arbitrary number of string tags. Please add this property to issues. Tags should not contain whitespace and should be entered with comma separation in the CLI.

title: test issue
description: This is a test issue to test the dynamic issue creation feature.

title: Update version string in CLI
description: The version string is currently just shown as 1.0.0. This should be updated to be based on the version number of the package release. Do this by updating the GitHub actions.

title: Add editor mode documentation to 'fleece create -h'
description: The 'fleece create -h' command currently doesn't show any information on what happens if it is run without any options. It should provide a brief description of the text editor mode in the description of the command.

title: Add editor mode to 'fleece edit'
description: The editor mode that opens when 'fleece create' is run should also open when 'fleece edit <id>' is run. Update the edit command to include this behaviour and update the documentation (both in the CLI and the docs/ folder) to suit.

title: Add tree view as 'fleece tree' command
description: The 'fleece tree' command should be added, showing the list of issues (using the same filtering behaviour as 'fleece list') in the CLI based on the parent-issues property. Just show it as a normal tree using a depth first search. If an issue is referenced by two children, only show it when it is reached in the first depth first search run, but add a small 'virtual' parent indicator above the second child issue to show the connection. Update the documentation to suit.

title: Combine diff and history commands
description: The 'fleece diff' and 'fleece history' commands contain similar behaviour. Just combine them into a single 'fleece diff' command which shows the current history if no arguments are provided but can do a diff if there are file names passed in

title: Add merge --dry-run flag
description: When a --dry-run flag is added to a merge command, it should just show the operations that it will perform and not actually perform the merge. This is for LLMs to be able to make decisions on merging issues without actually running the merge.

title: Add validate command for cyclic dependency detection
description:
Add a 'fleece validate' command that checks for cyclic dependencies in PreviousIssues relationships. The command should:

1. Load all issues and build a dependency graph from PreviousIssues
2. Use depth-first search to detect cycles
3. Report any cycles found with the issue IDs involved
4. Return exit code 0 if no cycles, non-zero if cycles detected

This enables CI integration to prevent invalid dependency chains from being committed.

Follow-up from issue bUkaYe.

title: List now shows all issues
description: List now shows all issues, regardless of whether the --all flag is provided or not. The "complete", "archived", "closed" and "deleted" issues should be removed.

title: Add error messaging for unknown schemas
description: When I run  leece list --all in a project that has an unknown schema in the .fleece/issues_{hash}.jsonl file, it just says that there are no issues. Add more detailed and specific error reporting when a file is detected but the information in the file cannot be read. List the number of rows (i.e. the number of issues) and list which properties are known and which are unknown. This may require some manual parsing of the JSONL.

title: Show command
description: Create a new  leece show <ID> command that shows all of the details related to an issue.

title: Object reference issue when editing status
description: When running a command like  leece edit gsVYAO --status complete the issue is updated but an 'Error: Object reference not set to an instance of an object' is also returned

title: Search doesn't work
description: The  leece search tool no longer works, stating Error: Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'source').

title: Commit and push changes
description: It should be possible to add --commit and --push flags to the  leece create command to commit and push changes to the issues in the current branch. A  leece commit --push command should also be available to do the same thing.

title: Add issues update instructions to  leece prime command
description: When  leece prime is run, it should include instructions to always commit changes to the files in the /.fleece folder so the issues are always kept up to date.

title: Simplify prime command
description: The prime command currently returns a very long response. It should instead return a short response with basic instructions, and delegate to  leece prime {feature} subcommands for more detailed instructions as required for specific workflows.

title: Merge dry run merges anyway
description: When the  leece merge command is run with the --dry-run flag, it merges the files anyway.

title: Merge doesn't merge changes
description: In one instance merging issues didn't merge the changes file as well. See the .tmp/folder for the files that caused this issue. At the very least an error should be output and no files should be changed.

title: Create schemas
description: The issue and change JSONL files should have well-defined schemas now that the design has settled to prevent future regressions.

title: Identify issues by reduced characters
description: When ID is used in certain commands (such as dit), three or more characters should be sufficient to identify an issue. If three or more characters are entered, use these to find the matching issue to edit. If there is more than one issue matching this pattern, show these in a table similar to the one for the list command, with a message that there are multiple matching issues.

title: Fix backtick rendering
description: The backtick character  doesn't render properly in the CLI. Either fix this rendering issue by replacing with a single quote ' when rendering (don't change the issue text itself) or work out how to render it properly.

title: Create TUI
description: Create a TUI for fleece that runs when just  leece is run. Use Terminal.Gui v2.

title: Test backtick rendering
description: This has a backtick ` character

title: Test with backtick
description: This has a backtick ` here

title: No output for 'fleece prime' without '.fleece' folder
description: When the 'fleece prime' command is run, it should not provide any output (i.e. no prompt priming) if there is no '.fleece' folder in the repository.

title: If there is an existing worktree when starting an agent, just use that worktree
description: This currently returns the following error when starting an agent on an existing worktree.

title: Start agents on existing worktrees
description:
When a new agent is started on an issue that has an existing worktree, due to not being able to create the new worktree in the folder the command fails and the agent doesn't start. If the worktree and folder already exist, the agent should instead just use start in that folder.

See logs below:

warn: Homespun.Features.Commands.CommandRunner[0]
      Command failed: git worktree add "/data/src/Fleece/issues/bug/list-now-shows-all-issues-DmqTst" "issues/bug/list-now-shows-all-issues+DmqTst" | ExitCode=128 | Duration=12ms | Error=Preparing worktree (checking out 'issues/bug/list-now-shows-all-issues+DmqTst')
